meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being flowery or ornate in style
meanings.sent1: The floridity of the garden brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent2: The floridity of the painting made it stand out in the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The floridity of his speech was so over-the-top that it made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her writing was filled with floridity, like a garden blooming with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The floridity of the ballroom decorations was like stepping into a fairy tale.

meanings.definition: Excessive or extravagant decoration or embellishment
The state of being excessively showy or elaborate
